about_the_game:
As an employee of Juice™, you wake up to a beautiful new day. While the urge to get to work is strong, there’s still time to tidy up at home and choose your outfit for the day. Once everything feels just right, you head off to your beloved Juice™ battery factory.

In this puzzle adventure, featuring 80s-styled graphics and modern physics, things are not always as straightforward as they seem. What starts as a simple journey to get to work turns into an adventure filled with obstacles, strange creatures, and inexplicable events.

  • Easy controls using keyboard, gamepad or touch input

  • Learn new abilities and combine them as game progresses

  • Bite-sized levels* with unique problems to solve

  • Character customization

  • Should run on a potato, see requirements for specifics

*Includes a subscription to Juice™ Reconstruction Service.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon / NVIDIA Geforce
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
